oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John Anthony Quitman
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: John Anthony Quitman (1799-1858) served as a brigadier general in the Mexican War and a major general in the U.S. regular army beginning in 1847.
From the original painting by Alonzo Chappel in the possession of the publishers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Generals; Uniforms; Horses
